entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F813,0,272001}Ah... this is a fine Great Soul. It{F801}overflows with the hopes of the people.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272002}Let me see here...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F813,0,272001}Ah... this is a fine Great Soul. It{F801}overflows with the hopes of the people.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272002}Let me see here...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Masakado swallowed the Great Spirit{F801}of Hope.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Masakado swallowed the Great Spirit{F801}of Hope.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272004}Ahh... I can feel it permeating my{F801}entire being...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272004}Ahh... I can feel it permeating my{F801}entire being...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272015}The two feelings that normally buttress{F801}hope are acting now as obstacles.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272015}The two feelings that normally buttress{F801}hope are acting now as obstacles.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272016}They are... the Great Spirit of Goodwill{F801}and the Great Spirit of Spite.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272016}They are... the Great Spirit of Goodwill{F801}and the Great Spirit of Spite.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272019}The Great Spirit of Goodwill has{F801}transformed into God's chariot,{F801}which rules the angels...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272020}And the Great Spirit of Spite has{F801}transformed into the Demon Lord that{F801}reigns over the demons.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272021}Both continue to gain strength that{F801}they might win the people's hopes...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272019}The Great Spirit of Goodwill has{F801}transformed into God's chariot,{F801}which rules the angels...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272020}And the Great Spirit of Spite has{F801}transformed into the Demon Lord that{F801}reigns over the demons.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272021}Both continue to gain strength that{F801}they might win the people's hopes...{F801}

entry.target: 〉 Masakado tried to join your team...{F801}{F802}〉 But {F843,0}'s stock was full...{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,1,402002}The New Emperor's power is unique and{F801}unparalleled...{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,272003}Congratulations on completing the quest.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272012}Ungh... they have grown so in{F801}strength...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272012}Ungh... they have grown so in{F801}strength...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272017}Goodwill is blindly moving only to{F801}preserve, and Spite is running amok{F801}solely for upheaval.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272017}Goodwill is blindly moving only to{F801}preserve, and Spite is running amok{F801}solely for upheaval.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272006}I have recovered somewhat. I can lend{F801}you my strength now.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272006}I have recovered somewhat. I can lend{F801}you my strength now.{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272013}I cannot return to my body like this.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272023}In order to reclaim myself from the{F801}dome, both of them must be slain...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272024}So that you may collect the Great{F801}Spirits of Goodwill and Spite.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Masakado\0{F87A,-360}{F813,0,272023}In order to reclaim myself from the{F801}dome, both of them must be slain...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272024}So that you may collect the Great{F801}Spirits of Goodwill and Spite.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,272008}Master {F843,0}, isn't this all{F801}so touching?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272009}It's been night in Tokyo for more than{F801}25 years, and now the sun is finally{F801}rising.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272010}Maybe I should keep a video log of{F801}this to commemorate it.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,272008}Master {F843,0}, isn't this all{F801}so touching?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272009}It's been night in Tokyo for more than{F801}25 years, and now the sun is finally{F801}rising.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272010}Maybe I should keep a video log of{F801}this to commemorate it.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,10,1,1}{F813,0,272027}Why don't we first make for Naraku,{F801}where the angels are?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,272028}If the ground above is to disappear,{F801}then we must ferry the people of the{F801}Eastern Kingdom of Mikado to Tokyo.{F801}
